reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Non lasciare che accada più. Affrontare la violenza contro le donne rafforzando l'accesso alla giustizia

description.narrative: Il progetto ha come obiettivo quello di garantire l'accesso alla giustizia per le vittime di violenza di genere e rafforzare i meccanismi preventivi e di risposta alle stesse attraverso il miglioramento delle capacità delle autorità giudiziarie competenti, delle OSCE e delle organizzazioni in difesa dei diritti umani
The project aims to ensure access to justice for gender-based violence survivors by improving the capacities of the duty-building on the lessons learned in the first phase of the project

participating-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
UNWOMEN - UNITED NATIONS ENTITY FOR GENDER EQUALITY AND THE EMPO

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

sector.narrative: Ending violence against women and girls
Women's rights organisations and movements, and government institutions

tag.narrative: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
By 2030, provide universal access to safe, inclusive and accessible, green and public spaces, in particular for women and children, older persons and persons with disabilities
Eliminate all forms of violence against all women and girls in the public and private spheres, including trafficking and sexual and other types of exploitation
Eliminate all harmful practices, such as child, early and forced marriage and female genital mutilation
End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere
Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Promote the rule of law at the national and international levels and ensure equal access to justice for all
Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere

Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)
